name: A Question for Mama
description:
The man who own the cafe was old and weary. As he watches his seven daughters run about the place he remembers his wife who fled back to the depths of the sea.

His seven daughters see him weary and see him sad and they too miss their Mama.
And so they dive into the cold darkness of the sea and they swim long and they swim deep until they find the Nine Undersea Kingdoms, where, perhaps, Mama may be found.

A Question for Mama is a gmful, diceless narrative roleplaying game of Fairy Tales and Magical Realism for up to seven players.
